body.instruction: Select the image of each emperor to learn more about what they did during their reign.

front.content: Bust of the Roman emperor Galba, preserved in the Hall of the Emperors of the Capitoline Museum, Rome©Alinari Archives / ImageQuest 2021

back.content:
I am known for:
  • ruling Rome for sevenmonths total, beginning in June, 68 CE
  • ruling Rome for two weeks in 69 CE (January 1st–-15st, CE)
  • being governor of Africa
